select*from (select*from (select ordernum, sellerid ,productname, productnum,orderquantity,userid, username, userphone, orderprice, orderdate, orderstatus, claimstatus, deliverystatus, storename from (select to_char(o.ordernum, '99999999999999') as ordernum, p.productname, p.userid as sellerid, od.productnum, o.userid as userid, o.username, o.userphone, o.orderprice, o.orderdate , nvl(od.orderquantity, 0) as orderquantity ,od.orderstatus, c.claimstatus, dn.deliverystatus, s.storename from ordertbl o left join orderdetail od on od.ordernum = o.ordernum left join product p on od.productnum = p.productnum left join discount d on d.productnum = od.productnum left join optiontbl op on op.optionnum = o.optionnum left join delivery de on de.ordernum = o.ordernum left join deliverynow dn on dn.ordernum = o.ordernum left join claim c on c.ordernum = o.ordernum left join seller s on p.userid = s.userid )
where ordernum = '${searchnum}'
where userid = '${searchid}'
where sellerid = '${searchid}'
order by ordernum desc) where rownum<=(${pageNum}*${onePageRecord}) order by ordernum) where rownum<= ${lastPageRecord} ${onePageRecord} order by ordernum desc
select count(ordernum) totalRecord from orderdetail join product on product.productnum = orderdetail.productnum

select ordernum, productname, sellerid, productnum, userid, username, userphone, deliverymemo, orderprice, orderdate, usedpoint, paymentoption, orderquantity, optionname, optionnum, optionprice, optionstock, orderstatus, saleprice receiver, receiverphone, deliverynum ,deliveryzipcode, deliveryaddr, deliverydetailaddr, deliverycompany, invoice, deliveryprice,deliverystatus, deliverydate, totalsaleprice, realpayment, realtotalpayment, claimkind, claimstatus, claimcontent, claimdate from (select to_char(o.ordernum, '99999999999999') as ordernum, p.productname, p.userid as sellerid, od.productnum, o.userid as userid, o.username, o.userphone, o.deliverymemo,o.orderprice, o.orderdate, nvl(o.usedpoint,0) as usedpoint, o.paymentoption, od.orderquantity, op.optionname, op.optionnum, nvl(op.optionprice, 0) as optionprice, op.optionstock, od.orderstatus, nvl(d.saleprice,0) as saleprice, o.receiver, o.receiverphone, o.deliveryzipcode, o.deliveryaddr,o.deliverydetailaddr, to_char(de.deliverynum, '999999999999')as deliverynum, de.deliverycompany, to_char(de.invoice,'9999999999999') as invoice , o.deliveryprice, dn.deliverystatus, dn.deliverydate, to_number(nvl(d.saleprice,0) * nvl(od.orderquantity, 0)) as totalsaleprice, to_number((o.orderprice - nvl(d.saleprice,0))*nvl(od.orderquantity,0) + nvl(op.optionprice, 0) - nvl(o.usedpoint, 0)) as realpayment, to_number((o.orderprice - nvl(d.saleprice,0))*nvl(od.orderquantity,0) + nvl(op.optionprice, 0) - nvl(o.usedpoint, 0) + nvl(o.deliveryprice, 0)) as realtotalpayment, c.claimkind, c.claimstatus, c.claimcontent, c.claimdate from ordertbl o left join orderdetail od on od.ordernum = o.ordernum left join product p on od.productnum = p.productnum left join discount d on d.productnum = od.productnum left join optiontbl op on op.optionnum = o.optionnum left join delivery de on de.ordernum = o.ordernum left join deliverynow dn on dn.ordernum = o.ordernum left join claim c on c.ordernum = o.ordernum where o.ordernum ='${ordernum}' ) order by ordernum desc
